TopicTitle: Let's Play KSP 1.0 Career mode on Moderate

Articles.Content:
Hey peeps,

As a recording gamer, and a somewhat noob-ish KSP player learning as he goes, I've started a new series on KSP (unmodded) recently. For those interested you can find it here:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLXIwxNbJRA-Bh-S2AKriGxo9rMIDfY2Cd" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Enjoy!
